remarks: Additive property of first (inner product) argument.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hdmaplna1.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmaplna1.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmaplna1.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hdmaplna1.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` U ) $.
hdmaplna1.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hdmaplna1.q $e |- .+^ = ( +g ` R ) $.
hdmaplna1.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmaplna1.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmaplna1.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
hdmaplna1.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
hdmaplna1.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. V ) $.
hdmaplna1 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( S ` Z ) ` ( X .+ Y ) ) = ( ( ( S ` Z ) ` X ) .+^ ( ( S ` Z ) ` Y ) ) ) $.
